# pause()

**Instance Method**

Pauses playback of the audio resource while maintaining the position in the audio stream.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor @preconcurrency func pause()
```

## Discussion

Resume playback of a paused audio resource by calling the [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/AudioPlaybackController/play()] method.

## Starting and stopping audio playback

- **play()**: Plays the audio resource.
- **stop()**: Stops playback of the audio resource and discards the location in the audio stream.
- **isPlaying**: A Boolean value that indicates whether playback is currently active.
